news.title: Bank of America tops estimates on better-than-expected net interest income, equities trading
news.summary: Bank of America, the second-largest U.S. bank by assets, has been a beneficiary of the industry's recent tailwinds.

news.title: Citigroup tops estimates as loan loss provisions come in lighter than expected
news.summary: Citigroup is in the midst of a restructuring, selling off parts of its overseas operations. Under CEO Jane Fraser, Citigroup is selling off some of its international operations.

news.title: Airbnb poaches former Meta GenAI leader to be new technology chief
news.summary: The new appointment comes amid Airbnb's massive app redesign, which added catering and personal training. The company has also added personal training to its app.

news.title: Saks Global, the longtime leader of luxury department stores, files for bankruptcy protection
news.summary: Saks Global, which also owns Neiman Marcus and Bergdorf Goodman, filed for bankruptcy protection after running out of cash. Saks Global also owns Macy's and Bloomingdales.

news.title: Mortgage refinance demand surges 40% higher after Trump post briefly tanks interest rates
news.summary: Mortgage rates dropped markedly at the end of last week, causing a huge jump in demand to refinance and a smaller surge in demand from homebuyers.

news.title: If you haven’t experienced a bear market, talk with someone who has. You’ll thank them later.
news.summary: Investors know bull markets end, of course. But they’re convinced they can get out before the fall. Investors know bull market end, but believe they can escape before fall.

news.title: Don’t fight the White House as it picks stock winners and losers, says Fundstrat’s Tom Lee
news.summary: The start of 2026 is being marked by Washington picking the stocks that will win and those that won’t says Fundstrat’s Tom Lee.

news.title: A Fed-Treasury asset trade? One analyst says a swap could help the struggling housing market.
news.summary: The White House is proposing a flurry of policies to stimulate the moribund housing market. One analyst is proposing another twist. The White House has proposed a series of measures to boost the housing market, including a tax break.

news.title: Four reasons to buy this overlooked group of stocks early in 2026
news.summary: Small-cap companies in the U.S. are expected by analysts to increase profits much more quickly than larger companies. Small companies see the greatest benefits from lower borrowing rates and tax breaks.

news.title: Here’s where inflation is hitting the middle class the most
news.summary: CPI report shows the cost of living rose in December. This is where many households are really feeling the pinch. The latest CPI report is available on CNN.com/Heroes.
